description:
Get the README content for a model.

Example cURL request:

```console
curl -s \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer $REPLICATE_API_TOKEN" \
  https://api.replicate.com/v1/models/replicate/hello-world/readme
```

The response will be the README content as plain text in Markdown format:

```
# Hello World Model

This is an example model that...
```

parameters.description: The name of the user or organization that owns the model.
parameters.name: model_owner

schema.description: The README content in Markdown format
